title.a: Fatality Vehicle Fire - Now Out 09/17/2022 INC#0245

item.description: Fatality Vehicle Fire - Now Out; INC#0245; 04:34AM; 8221 N Vantage Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3eXqC55; #SunValley; 24 Firefighters arrived quickly to find and extinguish (4:51 AM) a 25' travel trailer parked in a driveway area between two homes, well involved with fire. Firefighters held flames to the trailer, with heat damage to the eaves of both adjacent homes. The remains of an adult male were subsequently discovered within the charred remnants of the recreational vehicle. The fire's cause remains under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAFD, LAPD (Incident #772) and Coroner.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC14 E260 E289 E77 E81 RA89 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire 09/17/2022 INC#0289

item.description: Knockdown - Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0289; 06:57AM; 9000 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LoI3aw; #Palms; 124 LAFD Firefighters took just 73 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire that directly involved three businesses in a 50' x 400' one-story row of a dozen commercial occupancies. Heavy smoke impacted at least a half-dozen adjacent businesses, including a feline overnight boarding facility where several cats were rescued, but others sadly perished. Though there were no civilian injuries, one firefighter took ill during the intense firefight, and has been taken to an area hospital in fair condition for observation. The cause of the fire is under active investigation. LAFD Public Information Officer, Firefighter David Ortiz is en route, ETA 8:00 AM.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; AR11 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E210 E211 E229 E261 E263 E27 E292 E294 E295 E34 E37 E43 E59 E61 E62 E94 EA1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA5 RA92 RA94 T10 T11 T29 T5 T61 T63 T92 T94 T95 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Major Emergency Structure Fire; INC#0289; 05:44AM; 9000 W Venice Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3LoI3aw; #Palms; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations on a row of commercial businesses.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 BC5 BC9 CM20 CM22 E205 E210 E211 E229 E261 E263 E27 E292 E294 E295 E34 E37 E43 E59 E61 E62 E94 EA1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA43 RA5 RA92 RA94 T10 T11 T29 T5 T61 T63 T92 T94 T95 UR5 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0301; 07:13AM; 1536 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3S8gvIY; Watts; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighter extinguished the fire in 23 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters located and contained the fire within two hallways in the structure, preventing it from extending throughout. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 RA264 RA64 RA865 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0301; 06:50AM; 1536 E 102nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3BIlkDa; Watts; One story commercial building, approximately 75' x 100', with smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are no other buildings exposed.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E64 E65 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1501; 06:55PM; 8447 N Glenoaks Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sn4oYH; Sun Valley; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighter extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The building is a vacant commercial structure and the fire was contained to a contents fire only. No further details.; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 E24 E289 E298 E60 E98 RA98 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Auto Fire - Now Out; INC#1429; 06:10PM; 11201 W Pendleton St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3a6ah8l; Sun Valley; Firefighters extinguished four vehicles, well-involved in fire, at an auto junkyard with no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. The 9-1-1 call was received at 5:55PM. No further details. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 E260 E274 E289 E298 E77 E89 E98 T60 T74 T89 T98; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:58AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; KNOCKDOWN: 41 firefighters extinguished the fire in 37 minutes with no injuries reported. The bulk of the fire was located in the attic, running the walls which had to be opened up to chase down all remaining fire and smoldering spots. The incident commander requested LAFD Arson and LAPD respond for a potential suspect. While a knockdown was called, firefighters will continue working an area around the chimney (which had heavy fire) to ensure no hot spots remain. No further details.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 BC9 E226 E261 E292 E58 E61 E68 EM18 RA58 RA858 RA92 T26 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:21AM; 1622 S Stearns Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Dl0on7; Mid-City; Two story duplex with heavy smoke showing from the attic vents. Firefighters are in the offensive mode and report the first floor is clear. One additional task force requested.; FS 58; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E261 E292 E58 E68 RA58 T61 T92; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
